Name: OS:Memories
About the game: Investigate a computer [/] You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiosity. Understand what happened to Andy by browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS: Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer. Highlights: Immerse yourself in a pleasant and intimate environment through an old computer interface. Immerse yourself in Andy's life story and relive, through messages, memories and notes, the best and worst moments of his life. Figure out Andy's passwords and insight into his deepest deadlocks.
